Title: The Seven Year Itch
Writer: Billy Wilder (screenplay), George Axelrod (screenplay), George Axelrod (based upon an original play: "The Seven Year Itch")
Actors: Marilyn Monroe, Tom Ewell, Evelyn Keyes, Sonny Tufts
Plot: When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful neighbbor.
